label: 林羅山
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: 1583-1657.  Disciple of Fujiwara Seika.  From 1607 Razan entered the service of Ieyasu.  In the following fifty years he served four shoguns, and for generations, his descendants continued to serve as scholars to the bakufu (p. 403). [藤原惺窩、徳川家康]
